title: L'Oréal Paris EverSleek Sulfate Free Keratin Caring Shampoo, 8.5 fl. oz.
description: L’Oral EverSleek Keratin Caring sulfate free shampoo with sunflower oil for chemically straightened hair cleanses and cares for the essential protein and keratin found in hair. Repairs, smooths and improves hair texture. Our smoothing shampoo is silicone free and is especially gentle on keratin and color treated hair. There are no harsh sulfates, salts or surfactants that can strip, dull and damage hair. Experience a purely sensorial lush, luxurious lather and a fresh aromatic fragrance that blooms. • For Chemically Processed Hair • Sulfate Free • No Silicones • Sunflower Oil Apply to wet hair and massage gently into a thick lather. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with EverSleek Keratin Caring conditioner.
